//fonts fonts/avenir_regular.ttf fonts/avenir_bold.ttf fonts/avenir_semi_bold.ttf fonts/avenir_extra_bold.ttf //apply screen Apply Karein Verify mobile number Apke number pr bheja hua 4 number ka OTP niche enter kariye. Card delivery address Kripya apna current address bhariye. Apka card issi address pr deliver hoga. Pin Code Address(House No.,Building,Street,Area) Colony, Sector, Street Landmark City/District State Save Confirm Address Apne galat OTP enter kiya hai. Kripya dobara try kariye ya OTP resend kariye. Aapka registered mobile number match nahi ho raha hai. Kripya apne employer registered phone number se dobara login kariye. Complete KYC Enter Mobile Number Enter Registered Mobile number Send OTP Edit number Enter 4 digit OTP Agar apko OTP nahi mila hai. Resend OTP OTP field should not be empty Sorry, Aap AdvancePay k liye eligible nahi hai. Aapki PAN aur Employee ID details match nahi ho rahi hai. Kripya apni details jaanch kr sahi details bhariye
Apni details bhariye Full Name PAN Card K Anusaar
Date Of Birth Employee ID Next Permissions Kripya sahi PAN number enter kariye. PAN number apko yaha dekhne ko milega Apki employee id apko yaha dekhne ko milegi Apka account open krne ke liye humein in permissions ki jarurat hai. Location Apke phone ki location jaan kar apko better experience provide krne k liye. SMS Phone Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions User Terms and Conditions SBM Terms and Conditions Apke phone ka IMEI number k liye.
OTP autofill krne k liye. Thik Hai Review and submit details Aadhaar proof Apka address ab badal chuka hai. Mobile number should not be empty Mobile number length should be 10 digit +91 Apka passcode reset ho chuka hai. Kripya 10 number ka mobile number hi enter kariye OTP dobara send kr diya hai. Bina permission diye aap aage nahi bad payenge. Kripya dobara permission dien. Selfie 1 2 3 4 5 Start Continue 0 25 5 50 6 2 2% 3% 24% Finish GST PAN card and employee details Apni Details Jaanchein I Agree Main apni salary account PayU me open krne k liye sehemat hu. Main iske dvaara PayU ki privacy policy aur niyam aur sharto se sehemat hu,jinhe mere dvaara padha aur samjha gaya hai. I hereby irrevocably agree and acknowledge that, I have read and understood the Privacy Policy, SBM Terms and Conditions and User Terms and Conditions. aur se sehemat hu,jinhe mere dvaara padha aur samjha gaya hai. I hereby authorize PayU Payments Private Limited to share my profile and KYC details with Loantap (Lender) and SBM (PPI Issuer) and I understand that my data shall be stored and processed in accordance with their respective privacy policies. Main PayU ko apne account me paise nikalne or dalne ki sehemati pradan krta hu. By agreeing, I hereby confirm that all the information provided herein by me is true and correct. Re-Enter Passcode Set Passcode Kripya Sahi Passcode Daliye Passcode field should not be empty Re-enter passcode field should not be empty Passcode match nahi hua hai. Kripya same passcode enter kariye
Yeh apka login passcode hoga, Jisse apka account surakshit rahega. Kripya yeh passcode kisi k sath share na karien. Passcode match nahi hua hai.Kripya same passcode enter kariye Reset Enter New 4 Digit Passcode Reset Passcode Account khola ja rha hai... Humein kuch samay or dein taki apka naya AdvancePay account khol sake. In Progress Hum apki details verify kar rahe hai... Jaise hi apka account open ho jayega hum apko inform kar denge. Aapka account khulne me maximum 24 hours lag skte hain. PAN Number Verify Special characters not allowed. Only 0-9 is allowed. Verify PAN Card Number Mahesh Kumar Patil 203,Sunshine Heights,Tilak Road,Near Walkheart Hospital,Khar West,Mumbai 400045 Badhaai Ho Apka AdvancePay account khul chuka hai. Apko salary ab iss account me milegi. Apni salary advance bhi aap issi account mein le sakte hai. 2% fee applicable. Apne AdvancePay card ko online ya dukaan, ya kisi bhi ATM pr use kr skte hai. Kripya Dhyaan Dein Kaaran yaha likhiye... Apka AdvancePay card apke ghar pr agle 2-3 dino me deliver ho jayega. Kripya sahi PAN Number daliye Apko Advance amount apki earnings ke anusar milta hai. Apko aapke earnings ke 80% tak advance amount allowed hai. Apna Passcode Daliye Forgot Passcode? Agar apka registered mobile number active nahi h to kripya apni company ke records mein apna mobile number change karva lijiye. //Error screen Kisi technical error k karan, Hum page load nahi kr pa rhe hai. Kripya firse page reload kariye ya fir exit kr k firse app open kariye. No Internet..! Kripya apne phone ko internet se connect kariye. Kisi security issue k karan, Aap app use nhai kr payenge. Exit kr k firse app open kariye ya fir kripya app uninstall kr k firse install kariye Reload Page Exit Open Wifi Settings
Cards Card details dekhne ke liye tap kariye. Card Settings For any queries, Please call 07406193344 or email us at customercare@sbmbank.co.in Card Active Status Permanent Card Block Payment Controls Change Card Pin Card Swipe Online Transactions ATM Cash Withdrawals Transaction limits Swipe Limit ATM withdrawal Limit Online Transaction Limit Per Transaction Daily Change Limits Enter New Transaction limits ₹ 10000 Maximum limit: ₹ 50,000 Maximum limit: ₹ 50,000 Maximum limit: ₹ 20,000 Kripya apni maximum limit ya usse kam amount daliye Change And Save Apne online transactions band kr di hai. Reset All Re-Try Again Re-Try Error Try Again Permanent card block krne ka kaaran bataiye Card kho gya hai. Card damage ho gya hai. Card chori ho gaya hai. Other Submit No Delete Address Yes, Block Apka naya card apke ghar pr agle 2-3 dino me deliver ho jayega aur Naye card ki kimat ₹150 apke account se kaat liye jayenge. Apka naya card apke ghar pr agle 2-3 dino me deliver ho jayega. Aap pakka apna card hamesha k liye block krna chahte hai! Apna Delivery Address confirm karien
Apki details verify nahi ho saki. kyonki... Sorry, Apka account nahi khola ja sakta hai. Aap abhi humari services k liye eligible nahi hai. Dear Customer,
₹ ₹400 Passbook Reload Page Kisi technical error k karan transaction nahi aa pa rahi hai Apne abhi tak koi bhi transaction nahi ki hai! Apke liye peheli 4 bank transfer transactions free hai. Abhi Paise Bhejo Transactions Select Time Period Filters Total Kamayi: Total Kharch: Filters Transactions Account Type Apply Filter Apply Need Help ? Share On Whatsapp
Select time period Start Date End Date Ya aap custom date bhi select kr skte hai. Choose %1$s Enter valid %1$s Future date is not allowed %1$s must be greater than %2$s Apni salary advance aap iss account se lein sakte hai (2.36% fee applicable). Apni salary advance aap iss account se lein sakte hai (2.36% fee applicable).
Ab apni salary\n advance lijiye, or\n jaise chahe kharch \n kijiye :) Zero balance & All-in-one PPI account Apki salary or advance earnings dono ek hi PPI account se use kariye. Get exciting offers 2 free ATM cash withdrawals 6 free online bank transfers Bina surcharge diye petrol khareediye Apko ₹3000 tak petrol per 2.5% surcharge nahi lagega. ₹400 ₹0, No joining fees & Annual fees Apka all-in-one account is backed by Mitra apki financial problems solve krne k liye advance salary use krne ki suvidha layi hai. Apka salary PPI account RBI-licensed SBM bank me khola jayega taki apke paise safe rahe. LoanTap apko advance salary udhaar dega. Sirf pahele 5000 customers ke liye. Every month
Help? Apki Kharch Limit Account Balance Advance Allowed
Advance Past Usage Apne isse pehele advance use nahi kiya hai. Kripya apko di gayi advance limit ko use kr k suvidha ka fayeda uthayein. Apne pichhle halfte k pure paise pay back nahi kiye hai. Isliye apka account lock ho gaya hai. Dobara activate krne k liye overdue paise pay back kariye. Add ₹360 to Unlock Advance Available Advance Locked Apna Fayeda Samjhein Next Due Date: Advance Used Fees Charged Locked
Advance liye gaye ₹300 apke account se 12 May ko kaat liye jayenge.

Cancel Ok Kya aap sure hai ki apko Card deliver ho chuka hai? Kya aap sure hai ki apko card deliver nahi hua hai? Agar ha, Toh humein apko naya card firse bhejne me 3-4 din ka aur time lag skta hai. Card deliver ho chuka hai. Kripya apna card activate kariye. Apko apna mobile number OTP dwara verify karana hoga. Card ka 4 digit ka naya pin set karna hai. Apka card activate ho jayega. Enjoy :) confirm Card mil gaya hai Set Card Pin Offers & Deals Re-order Card Kripya Dhyaan Dein Apka card deliver nahi ho paya hai. Kripya naya card re-order kariye. Card re-order k liye apko ₹150 chukane honge. //user profile My Profile Namastey Help & FAQs
